slide-1.title: How to Play
content: 12D is a game where you predict the number where the ball stops on the 12D board. There are 12 numbers with red and black colors, including 1 jackpot.

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: You can bet on numbers, number ranges, colors, or odd/even. After placing your bets, the ball will be rolled on the 12D board.

slide-3.title: How to Play
content: The ball will stop at one position, and bets matching the result will win.
